    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot(char id,
             int startRow,
             int startCol)
        Sets up the robot with its parameters from the board

        Also sets up ArrayList to store flags which have been collected

        Parameters:
        id - The name of the players Robot
        startRow - The row the robot starts at
        startCol - The column the robot starts at
